info.description: API documentation for Gundam Platform application
info.title: Gundam Platform API

post.description: Authenticate a user using Google ID token. If the user doesn't exist, a new user will be created.
post.summary: Login or register a user with Google account

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access token

get.description: Retrieves all items in the user's shopping cart with detailed information

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve cart items

post.description: Adds a Gundam model to the user's shopping cart

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to add cart item

delete.description: Removes a specific item from the user's shopping cart

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid cart item ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete cart item

get.description: Checks if an email already exists in the database
Retrieves a list of all available Gundam model grades

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of Gundam grades

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve Gundam grades

get.description: Retrieves a list of selling Gundams, optionally filtered by grade

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve Gundams

get.description: Retrieves a specific Gundam model by its unique slug

404.description: Not Found - Gundam with specified slug does not exist

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve Gundam

get.description: List all purchase orders of the normal user
get.summary: List all purchase orders of the normal user

post.description: Create a new order for purchasing Gundam models
Generates and sends an OTP to the specified email address
post.summary: Generate a One-Time Password (OTP) for email

429.description: Too Many Requests - OTP request rate limit exceeded

post.description: Verifies the OTP sent to a user's email address and updates the user's email if valid

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or OTP verification failed

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to update user information

post.description: Generates and sends an OTP to the specified phone number. The OTP will be valid for 10 minutes.
post.summary: Generate a One-Time Password (OTP) for phone number

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid phone number format

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to generate or send OTP

post.description: Verifies the OTP sent to a user's phone number and updates the user's phone number if valid
post.summary: Verify One-Time Password (OTP) via phone number

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or OTP verification failed

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to update user information

get.description: Get all gundams that belong to the specified seller ID
get.summary: List all gundams for a specific seller

post.description: Create a new Gundam model with images and accessories

parameters.description: Accessory as JSON object. Add multiple accessories by repeating this field with different values.
parameters.name: accessory

get.description: Get all sale orders that belong to the specified seller ID
get.summary: List all sale orders for a specific seller

patch.description: Confirm an order for the specified seller. This endpoint checks the order's status before proceeding.

400.description: Invalid order ID or seller ID

403.description: Order does not belong to this seller

409.description: Order is not in pending status

get.description: Get the current active subscription for the specified seller
Get detailed information about a specific seller

patch.description: Publish a gundam for sale for the specified seller. This endpoint checks the gundam's status before proceeding.

403.description: Seller does not own this gundam

409.description:
Subscription limit exceeded
Subscription expired
Gundam is not available for publishing

patch.description: Unpublish a gundam for the specified seller. This endpoint checks the gundam's status before proceeding.

403.description: Seller does not own this gundam

409.description: Gundam is not currently listed for sale

post.description: Verifies a JWT access token and returns the associated user
Create a new user with email and password
Upgrade the user's role to seller and create the trial subscription

get.description: Get user details using a phone_number number as a query parameter
get.summary: Retrieve a user by phone_number number

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific user

put.description: Update specific user details by user ID

get.description: Get all addresses for a specific user

post.description: Add a new address for a specific user

get.description: Get the pickup address of a specific user

put.description: Update an existing address information for a specific user

delete.description: Delete an address of a user

409.description: Cannot delete primary or pickup address

patch.description: Upload and update a user's profile avatar

phone_number.description: S in thoi cn gi OTP

user_id.description: ID ca user cn cp nht s in thoi

buyer_address_id.description:
ID of the buyer's address
example: 42

gundam_ids.description:
List of Gundam IDs in the order
example: [1, 2, 3]

items_subtotal.description:
Total value of all items (excluding delivery fee)
minimum: 0
example: 500000

note.description:
Optional note for the order
maxLength: 255
example: Please deliver in the morning

payment_method.description:
Payment method (wallet: pay via platform wallet, cod: cash on delivery)
enums: wallet,cod
example: wallet

seller_id.description:
ID of the seller
example: user123

total_amount.description:
Total order amount (including delivery fee)
minimum: 0
example: 530000

order_delivery.description: Thng tin giao hng  c cp nht vi m GHN

order_items.description: Cc mt hng trong n hng

order_transaction.description: Giao dch n hng  c cp nht vi seller_entry_id

seller_entry.description: Bt ton cng tin cho ngi bn (pending)

valid.description: Valid is true if DeliveryOverralStatus is not NULL

accessToken.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
accessToken.name: Authorization
